actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-699.

official_title: A resolution waiving points of order against the bill (H.R. 11771) making appropriations for Foreign Assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that during the consideration of the bill (H. R. 11771) making appropriations for Foreign Assistance and related programs for fiscal year 1974, all points of order against said bill are hereby waived.

titles.title: A resolution waiving points of order against the bill (H.R. 11771) making appropriations for Foreign Assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes.
